about_the_game:
Subterranea in ruins

Hop is a young hopper on a mission to explore the deepest depths of Subterranea, an underground realm desperate to reconnect with the surface. Help him navigate the perilous tunnels riddled with traps and fierce enemies. Defeat powerful bosses and get closer to uncovering the long buried mystery.

Side-Scrolling Platformer Action

Dive into an exhilarating Metroidvania-style adventure that seamlessly blends classic platforming dynamics with the thrilling intensity of twin-stick shooting.

Diverse arsenal of guns

Discover a diverse arsenal of guns, each unlockable through in-game currency, offering unique ways to conquer challenges.

Player Upgrades

Become stronger by finding new heart containers. Upgrade shield , dash and bullet booster specifications to make them last longer and reduce cooldown time.

Helpful Pick-Ups

Find strategic items along the way to aid with progression.

Player Accessibility

Designed to welcome players of all skill levels. Blast Hopper avoids the steep learning curve, making it perfect for both casual play and thrilling adventure. Embrace the fun and excitement as you leap, shoot, and dash your way through a world rich with discovery and action!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Dive into an exhilarating Metroidvania-style 2D platformer adventure that blends classic platforming mechanics with the thrilling intensity of twin-stick shooting. Help Hop survive his inner demons on his journey to the deepest depths of Subterranea to restore the severed link with the surface.
